title: Stable, downloadable Android release AAB artifact output

requirements.summary: Produce a clearly named release .aab in a stable output directory under frontend/android-wrapper in addition to Gradleâ€™s default output path.
acceptanceCriteria: Running the release build script results in the original AAB still being generated at: frontend/android-wrapper/twa/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab

The build script also copies the generated AAB to a stable, human-friendly path under frontend/android-wrapper (for example: frontend/android-wrapper/out/app-release.aab, or another clearly documented fixed location)
The stable output directory is created automatically if it does not exist
The script prints the stable output file path at the end so a user can locate and download/share it immediately
The repository ignores the stable output directory and build artifacts via .gitignore (to avoid committing large binaries)

file_operations.description: After confirming the Gradle-generated AAB exists, create a stable output directory under frontend/android-wrapper (e.g., WRAPPER_DIR/out), copy the AAB to frontend/android-wrapper/out/app-release.aab, and print the stable output file path at the end of the script while preserving the existing Gradle output behavior.
Add ignore rules for the stable AAB output directory and copied build artifacts (e.g., ignore android-wrapper/out/ and any .aab files placed there) so generated binaries are not committed.

requirements.summary: Document exactly where to find the downloadable/shareable AAB produced by the updated release build script.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/docs/ANDROID_AAB.md (and/or the android-wrapper README) explicitly states the final stable path where the AAB will be available after a successful release build
Documentation is in English and includes the exact filename and directory to look in after building
Documentation matches the actual behavior/output path of the build script

file_operations.description: Add a short, explicit section titled "Where to find the AAB file to download/share" that states the exact stable output path and filename produced by the build script (e.g., frontend/android-wrapper/out/app-release.aab) and notes that the original Gradle output path is still produced.

Complete/update the "Output Location" section to explicitly point to the stable, human-friendly AAB path produced after a successful release build (e.g., frontend/android-wrapper/out/app-release.aab), ensuring it matches the build-release-aab.sh behavior.
